extends Object

      • save

        public void save()
        Persists entity:
        1. calls "preSave()"
        2. calls " getBO().save()"
        3. calls "postSave()"
        4. close dialog (if is defined)

        public void createDataModel()

      • delete

        public void delete()
        This method will delete the current entity calling "bo.delete()":
        1. calls "preDelete()"
        2. calls "getBO().delete"
        3. calls "postDelete()" if deletion is successful

      • remove

        public void remove()
        This method will delete the current entity calling "bo.remove()":
        1. calls "preDelete()"
        2. calls "getBO().remove"
        3. calls "postDelete()" if deletion is successful

        public void reloadEntity()
        Reload a entity calling "dao.find(id)"
